level.text: A commercial or industrial use that is first permitted in the CM or M Zone Districts and that is in existence with a valid Certificate of Occupancy as of the date the provisions of this Chapter first became effective shall be deemed a conforming use, but shall not be entitled to expand.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 72 (January 7, 2005); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 1587 (February 16, 2007); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 58 DCR 4314, 4315 (May 20, 2011).
